author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Mexican Coronavirus Cases Spike 21% over Weekend
description: Mexican health officials saw a 21 percent jump in new cases of Coronavirus (COVID-19) in a span of two days, leading to a total of 2,143 since the pandemic first arrived in the country. Officials are warning the public “the toughest” part is yet to come.
content:
